page.title: 18Home Life in Pennington
page.content: 1My name is Emma Bain. I got up at 6.40 and went down for breakfast.I had wheataflakes and a jam sandwich.Next I got washed and dressed.Then my mum came home from work on the night shift at the hospital. Then my dad went to work. My brother and I walked the half mile to school.When I got there I talked to Amy until the bell went then went into school.I got out my Reading To Some Purpose.While I was waiting Mr.Nicholson collected dinner money. After Assembly and maths we went out to play.After playtime I did my project work then had dinner.After dinner I went out to play again at rounders.In the afternoon we had hand writing,art/craft and singing with Mrs Smethurst.At hometime I took Amy with me and we played at offices till teatime.After tea Amy went home.I watched TV till bedtime at 20.00.
